thread.title: Erika Cadengo
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Erika Cadengo

author: Erika Cadengo
title: Erika Cadengo
text:
Erin Murphy is a great contact, he always helps us out and answer all our questions. I was worried because I didn't have the design we used in an old design and he helped me out with the file he saved for us in the past. That makes my job easier.
Our hats arrived on time and with the design we requested.
Erika C
